variable.name: APPLE
variable.desc: True if running on Mac OSX.

variable.name: BORLAND
variable.desc: True of the borland compiler is being used.

variable.name: BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
variable.desc: Global flag to cause add_library to create shared libraries if on.

variable.name: CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX
variable.desc: Default filename postfix for libraries under configuration <CONFIG>.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_ARCHIVE_APPEND
variable.desc: Rule variable to append to a static archive.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_ARCHIVE_CREATE
variable.desc: Rule variable to create a new static archive.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_ARCHIVE_FINISH
variable.desc: Rule variable to finish an existing static archive.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER
variable.desc: The full path to the compiler for LANG.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ABI
variable.desc: An internal variable subject to change.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID
variable.desc: An internal variable subject to change.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILE_OBJECT
variable.desc: Rule variable to compile a single object file.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_CREATE_SHARED_LIBRARY
variable.desc: Rule variable to create a shared library.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_CREATE_SHARED_MODULE
variable.desc: Rule variable to create a shared module.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_CREATE_STATIC_LIBRARY
variable.desc: Rule variable to create a static library.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG
variable.desc: Flags for Debug build type or configuration.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_MINSIZEREL
variable.desc: Flags for MinSizeRel build type or configuration.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_RELEASE
variable.desc: Flags for Release build type or configuration.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO
variable.desc: Flags for RelWithDebInfo type or configuration.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_IGNORE_EXTENSIONS
variable.desc: File extensions that should be ignored by the build.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_IMPLICIT_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
variable.desc: Directories implicitly searched by the compiler for header files.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_PREFERENCE
variable.desc: Determine if a language should be used for linking.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_LINK_EXECUTABLE
variable.desc: Rule variable to link and executable.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_OUTPUT_EXTENSION
variable.desc: Extension for the output of a compile for a single file.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_PLATFORM_ID
variable.desc: An internal variable subject to change.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_SIZEOF_DATA_PTR
variable.desc: An internal variable subject to change.

variable.name: CMAKE_<LANG>_SOURCE_FILE_EXTENSIONS
variable.desc: Extensions of source files for the given language.

variable.name: CMAKE_AR
variable.desc: Name of archiving tool for static libraries.

variable.name: CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
variable.desc: Where to put all the ARCHIVE targets when built.

variable.name: CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY
variable.desc: Version of cmake required to build project

variable.name: CMAKE_BINARY_DIR
variable.desc: The path to the top level of the build tree.

variable.name: CMAKE_BUILD_TOOL
variable.desc: Tool used for the acutal build process.

variable.name: CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE
variable.desc: Specifies the build type for make based generators.

variable.name: CMAKE_BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_RPATH
variable.desc: Use the install path for the RPATH

variable.name: CMAKE_CACHEFILE_DIR
variable.desc: The directory with the CMakeCache.txt file.

variable.name: CMAKE_CACHE_MAJOR_VERSION
variable.desc: Major version of CMake used to create the CMakeCache.txt file

variable.name: CMAKE_CACHE_MINOR_VERSION
variable.desc: Minor version of CMake used to create the CMakeCache.txt file

variable.name: CMAKE_CACHE_RELEASE_VERSION
variable.desc: Release version of CMake used to create the CMakeCache.txt file

variable.name: CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR
variable.desc: Build time configuration directory for project.

variable.name: CMAKE_CL_64
variable.desc: Using the 64 bit compiler from Microsoft

variable.name: CMAKE_COLOR_MAKEFILE
variable.desc: Enables color output when using the Makefile generator.

variable.name: CMAKE_COMMAND
variable.desc: The full path to the cmake executable.

variable.name: CMAKE_COMPILER_2005
variable.desc: Using the Visual Studio 2005 compiler from Microsoft

variable.name: CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNU<LANG>
variable.desc: True if the compiler is GNU.

variable.name: CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES
variable.desc: Specifies the available build types.

variable.name: CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING
variable.desc: Is CMake currently cross compiling.

variable.name: CMAKE_CTEST_COMMAND
variable.desc: Full path to ctest command installed with cmake.

variable.name: CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR
variable.desc: The path to the binary directory currently being processed.

variable.name: CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE
variable.desc: Full path to the listfile currently being processed.

variable.name: CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE
variable.desc: The line number of the current file being processed.

variable.name: CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR
variable.desc: The path to the source directory currently being processed.

variable.name: CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX
variable.desc: See variable CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX.

variable.name: CMAKE_DL_LIBS
variable.desc: Name of library containing dlopen and dlcose.

variable.name: CMAKE_EDIT_COMMAND
variable.desc: Full path to CMakeSetup or ccmake.

variable.name: CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for executables on this platform.

variable.name: CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS
variable.desc: Linker flags used to create executables.

variable.name: CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS_[CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE]
variable.desc: Flag used when linking an executable.

variable.name: CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_PREFIXES
variable.desc: Prefixes to prepend when looking for libraries.

variable.name: CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_SUFFIXES
variable.desc: Suffixes to append when looking for libraries.

variable.name: CMAKE_Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY
variable.desc: Fortran module output directory.

variable.name: CMAKE_GENERATOR
variable.desc: The generator used to build the project.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOME_DIRECTORY
variable.desc: Path to top of source tree.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_APPLE
variable.desc: True for Apple OSXoperating systems.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM
variable.desc: Name of system cmake is being run on.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME
variable.desc: Name of the OS CMake is running on.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR
variable.desc: The name of the CPU CMake is running on.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION
variable.desc: OS version CMake is running on.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_UNIX
variable.desc: True for UNIX and UNIX like operating systems.

variable.name: CMAKE_HOST_WIN32
variable.desc: True on windows systems, including win64.

variable.name: CMAKE_IMPORT_LIBRARY_PREFIX
variable.desc: The prefix for import libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_IMPORT_LIBRARY_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for import libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_FILE() and FIND_PATH().

variable.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR
variable.desc: Mac OSX directory name for installed targets.

variable.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX
variable.desc: Install directory used by install.

variable.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH
variable.desc: The rpath to use for installed targets.

variable.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH
variable.desc: Add paths to linker search and installed rpath.

variable.name: CMAKE_INTERNAL_PLATFORM_ABI
variable.desc: An internal variable subject to change.

variable.name: CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
variable.desc: Where to put all the LIBRARY targets when built.

variable.name: CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_LIBRARY().

variable.name: CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH_FLAG
variable.desc: The flag used to add a library search path to a compiler.

variable.name: CMAKE_LINK_DEF_FILE_FLAG
variable.desc: Linker flag used to specify a .def file for dll creation.

variable.name: CMAKE_LINK_LIBRARY_FILE_FLAG
variable.desc: Flag used to link a library specified by a path to its file.

variable.name: CMAKE_LINK_LIBRARY_FLAG
variable.desc: Flag used to link a library into an executable.

variable.name: CMAKE_LINK_LIBRARY_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_MAJOR_VERSION
variable.desc: The Major version of cmake (i.e. the 2 in 2.X.X)

variable.name: CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM
variable.desc: See CMAKE_BUILD_TOOL.

variable.name: CMAKE_MFC_FLAG
variable.desc: Tell cmake to use MFC for an executable or dll.

variable.name: CMAKE_MINOR_VERSION
variable.desc: The Minor version of cmake (i.e. the 4 in X.4.X).

variable.name: CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
variable.desc: Path to look for cmake modules to load.

variable.name: CMAKE_NOT_USING_CONFIG_FLAGS
variable.desc: Skip _BUILD_TYPE flags if true.

variable.name: CMAKE_OBJECT_PATH_MAX
variable.desc: Maximum object file full-path length allowed by native build tools.

variable.name: CMAKE_PARENT_LIST_FILE
variable.desc: Full path to the parent listfile of the one currently being processed.

variable.name: CMAKE_PATCH_VERSION
variable.desc: The patch version of cmake (i.e. the 3 in X.X.3).

variable.name: CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_XXX(), with appropriate suffixes added.

variable.name: CMAKE_PROGRAM_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_PROGRAM().

variable.name: CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME
variable.desc: The name of the current project.

variable.name: CMAKE_RANLIB
variable.desc: Name of randomizing tool for static libraries.

variable.name: CMAKE_ROOT
variable.desc: Install directory for running cmake.

variable.name: CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
variable.desc: Where to put all the RUNTIME targets when built.

variable.name: CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_PREFIX
variable.desc: The prefix for shared libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for shared libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_SHARED_MODULE_PREFIX
variable.desc: The prefix for loadable modules that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_SHARED_MODULE_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for shared libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P
variable.desc: Size of a void pointer.

variable.name: CMAKE_SKIP_BUILD_RPATH
variable.desc: Do not include RPATHs in the build tree.

variable.name: CMAKE_SKIP_RPATH
variable.desc: If true, do not add run time path information.

variable.name: CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR
variable.desc: The path to the top level of the source tree.

variable.name: CMAKE_STANDARD_LIBRARIES
variable.desc: Libraries linked into every executable and shared library.

variable.name: CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_PREFIX
variable.desc: The prefix for static libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX
variable.desc: The suffix for static libraries that you link to.

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM
variable.desc: Name of system cmake is compiling for.

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_FILE() and FIND_PATH().

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_LIBRARY_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_LIBRARY().

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME
variable.desc: Name of the OS CMake is building for.

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_XXX(), with appropriate suffixes added.

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR
variable.desc: The name of the CPU CMake is building for.

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROGRAM_PATH
variable.desc: Path used for searching by FIND_PROGRAM().

variable.name: CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION
variable.desc: OS version CMake is building for.

variable.name: CMAKE_USER_MAKE_RULES_OVERRIDE
variable.desc: Specify a file that can change the build rule variables.

variable.name: CMAKE_USER_MAKE_RULES_OVERRIDE_<LANG>
variable.desc: Specify a file that can change the build rule variables.

variable.name: CMAKE_USE_RELATIVE_PATHS
variable.desc: Use relative paths (May not work!).

variable.name: CMAKE_USING_VC_FREE_TOOLS
variable.desc: True if free visual studio tools being used.

variable.name: CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE
variable.desc: Create verbose makefiles if on.

variable.name: CMAKE_VERSION
variable.desc: The full version of cmake in major.minor.patch format.

variable.name: CYGWIN
variable.desc: True for cygwin.

variable.name: EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH
variable.desc: Old executable location variable.

variable.name: LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH
variable.desc: Old library location variable.

variable.name: MSVC
variable.desc: True when using Microsoft Visual C

variable.name: MSVC80
variable.desc: True when using Microsoft Visual C 8.0

variable.name: MSVC_IDE
variable.desc: True when using the Microsoft Visual C IDE

variable.name: MSVC_VERSION
variable.desc: The version of Microsoft Visual C/C++ being used if any.

variable.name: PROJECT_BINARY_DIR
variable.desc: Full path to build directory for project.

variable.name: PROJECT_NAME
variable.desc: Name of the project given to the project command.

variable.name: PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR
variable.desc: Top level source directory for the current project.

variable.name: UNIX
variable.desc: True for UNIX and UNIX like operating systems.

variable.name: WIN32
variable.desc: True on windows systems, including win64.

variable.name: [Project name]_BINARY_DIR
variable.desc: Top level binary directory for the named project.

variable.name: [Project name]_SOURCE_DIR
variable.desc: Top level source directory for the named project.

property.name: ABSTRACT
property.desc: Additional flags to be added when compiling this source file.

property.name: ADDITIONAL_MAKE_CLEAN_FILES
property.desc: Additional files to clean during the make clean stage.

property.name: ALLOW_DUPLICATE_CUSTOM_TARGETS
property.desc: Allow duplicate custom targets to be created.

property.name: ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
property.desc: Output directory in which to build ARCHIVE target files.

property.name: BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_RPATH
property.desc: Should build tree targets have install tree rpaths.

property.name: CACHE_VARIABLES
property.desc: List of cache variables available in the current directory.

property.name: CLEAN_DIRECT_OUTPUT
property.desc: Per-configuration preprocessor definitions on a target.

property.name: CLEAN_NO_CUSTOM
property.desc: Should the output of custom commands be left.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS
property.desc: Preprocessor definitions for compiling a directory's sources.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG>
property.desc: Per-configuration preprocessor definitions in a directory.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG
property.desc: Preprocessor definitions for compiling a directory's sources.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Preprocessor definitions for compiling a directory's sources.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_RELEASE
property.desc: Preprocessor definitions for compiling a directory's sources.

property.name: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Preprocessor definitions for compiling a directory's sources.

property.name: COMPILE_FLAGS
property.desc: Additional flags to use when compiling this target's sources.

property.name: DEBUG_CONFIGURATIONS
property.desc: Specify which configurations are for debugging.

property.name: DEBUG_OUTPUT_NAME
property.desc: Sets the real name of a target when it is built.

property.name: DEBUG_POSTFIX
property.desc: See target property <CONFIG>_POSTFIX.

property.name: DEBUG_POSTFIX
property.desc: Postfix to append to the target file name for configuration <CONFIG>.

property.name: DEFINE_SYMBOL
property.desc: Define a symbol when compiling this target's sources.

property.name: DEFINITIONS
property.desc: For CMake 2.4 compatibility only. Use COMPILE_DEFINITIONS instead.

property.name: DISABLED_FEATURES
property.desc: List of features which are disabled during the CMake run.

property.name: ENABLED_FEATURES
property.desc: List of features which are enabled during the CMake run.

property.name: ENABLED_LANGUAGES
property.desc: Read-only property that contains the list of currently enabled languages

property.name: ENABLE_EXPORTS
property.desc: Exclude the target from the all target.

property.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL
property.desc: Exclude the directory from the all target of its parent.

property.name: EXTERNAL_OBJECT
property.desc: If set to true then this is an object file.

property.name: EchoString
property.desc: A message to be displayed when the target is built.

property.name: FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION
property.desc: If the output matches this regular expression the test will fail.

property.name: FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB64_PATHS
property.desc: Whether FIND_LIBRARY should automatically search lib64 directories.

property.name: FRAMEWORK
property.desc: This target is a framework on the Mac.

property.name: Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY
property.desc: Specify output directory for Fortran modules provided by the target.

property.name: GENERATED
property.desc: Is this source file generated as part of the build process.

property.name: GENERATOR_FILE_NAME
property.desc: Generator's file for this target.

property.name: GLOBAL_DEPENDS_DEBUG_MODE
property.desc: Enable global target dependency graph debug mode.

property.name: HAS_CXX
property.desc: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a target.

property.name: HEADER_FILE_ONLY
property.desc: Is this source file only a header file.

property.name: IMPLICIT_DEPENDS_INCLUDE_TRANSFORM
property.desc: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a directory.

property.name: IMPORTED
property.desc: Read-only indication of whether a target is IMPORTED.

property.name: IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS
property.desc: Configurations provided for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: IMPORTED_IMPLIB
property.desc: Full path to the import library for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: IMPORTED_IMPLIB_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_IMPLIB property.

property.name: IMPORTED_IMPLIB_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_IMPLIB property.

property.name: IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_IMPLIB property.

property.name: IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_IMPLIB property.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES
property.desc: Dependent shared libraries of an imported shared library.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_DEPENDENT_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES
property.desc: Transitive link interface of an IMPORTED target.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES.

property.name: IMPORTED_LOCATION
property.desc: Full path to the main file on disk for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LOCATION property.

property.name: IMPORTED_LOCATION_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LOCATION property.

property.name: IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LOCATION property.

property.name: IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_LOCATION property.

property.name: IMPORTED_SONAME
property.desc: The 'soname' of an IMPORTED target of shared library type.

property.name: IMPORTED_SONAME_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_SONAME property.

property.name: IMPORTED_SONAME_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_SONAME property.

property.name: IMPORTED_SONAME_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_SONAME property.

property.name: IMPORTED_SONAME_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration version of IMPORTED_SONAME property.

property.name: IMPORT_PREFIX
property.desc: What comes before the import library name.

property.name: IMPORT_SUFFIX
property.desc: What comes after the import library name.

property.name: INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
property.desc: List of preprocessor include file search directories.

property.name: INCLUDE_REGULAR_EXPRESSION
property.desc: Include file scanning regular expression.

property.name: INSTALL_NAME_DIR
property.desc: Mac OSX directory name for installed targets.

property.name: INSTALL_RPATH
property.desc: The rpath to use for installed targets.

property.name: INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH
property.desc: Add paths to linker search and installed rpath.

property.name: IN_TRY_COMPILE
property.desc: Read-only property that is true during a try-compile configuration.

property.name: KEEP_EXTENSION
property.desc: Make the output file have the same extension as the source file.

property.name: LANGUAGE
property.desc: The full path to a source file.

property.name: LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
property.desc: Output directory in which to build LIBRARY target files.

property.name: LINKER_LANGUAGE
property.desc: What tool to use for linking, based on language.

property.name: LINK_DIRECTORIES
property.desc: List of linker search directories.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS
property.desc: Additional flags to use when linking this target.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS_<CONFIG>
property.desc: Per-configuration linker flags for a target.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS_DEBUG
property.desc: Additional flags to use when linking this target.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Additional flags to use when linking this target.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS_RELEASE
property.desc: Additional flags to use when linking this target.

property.name: LINK_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Additional flags to use when linking this target.

property.name: LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES
property.desc: List public interface libraries for a shared library or executable.

property.name: LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_DEBUG
property.desc: Per-configuration list of public interface libraries for a target.

property.name: LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Per-configuration list of public interface libraries for a target.

property.name: LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_RELEASE
property.desc: Per-configuration list of public interface libraries for a target.

property.name: LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Per-configuration list of public interface libraries for a target.

property.name: LINK_SEARCH_END_STATIC
property.desc: End a link line such that static system libraries are used.

property.name: LISTFILE_STACK
property.desc: The current stack of listfiles being processed.

property.name: LOCATION
property.desc: Read-only location of a target on disk.

property.name: LOCATION_<CONFIG>
property.desc: Read-only property providing a target location on disk.

property.name: LOCATION_DEBUG
property.desc: Read-only location of a target on disk.

property.name: LOCATION_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Read-only location of a target on disk.

property.name: LOCATION_RELEASE
property.desc: Read-only location of a target on disk.

property.name: LOCATION_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Read-only location of a target on disk.

property.name: MACOSX_BUNDLE
property.desc: Build an executable as an application bundle on Mac OS X.

property.name: MACOSX_BUNDLE_INFO_PLIST
property.desc: Specify a custom Info.plist template for a Mac OS X App Bundle.

property.name: MACOSX_FRAMEWORK_INFO_PLIST
property.desc: Specify a custom Info.plist template for a Mac OS X Framework.

property.name: MACOSX_PACKAGE_LOCATION
property.desc: Place a source file inside a Mac OS X bundle or framework.

property.name: MACROS
property.desc: List of macro commands available in the current directory.

property.name: MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG>
property.desc: Map from project configuration to IMPORTED target's configuration.

property.name: MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_DEBUG
property.desc: Configurations provided for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_MINSIZEREL
property.desc: Configurations provided for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_RELEASE
property.desc: Configurations provided for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_RELWITHDEBINFO
property.desc: Configurations provided for an IMPORTED target.

property.name: MEASUREMENT
property.desc: Specify a DART measurement and value to be reported for a test.

property.name: MINSIZEREL_OUTPUT_NAME
property.desc: Sets the real name of a target when it is built.

property.name: MINSIZEREL_POSTFIX
property.desc: Postfix to append to the target file name for configuration <CONFIG>.

property.name: OBJECT_DEPENDS
property.desc: Additional files on which a compiled object file depends.

property.name: OBJECT_OUTPUTS
property.desc: Additional outputs for a Makefile rule.

property.name: OUTPUT_NAME
property.desc: Sets the real name of a target when it is built.

property.name: PACKAGES_FOUND
property.desc: List of packages which were found during the CMake run.

property.name: PACKAGES_NOT_FOUND
property.desc: List of packages which were not found during the CMake run.

property.name: PARENT_DIRECTORY
property.desc: Source directory that added current subdirectory.

property.name: PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION
property.desc: The output must match this regular expression for the test to pass.

property.name: POST_INSTALL_SCRIPT
property.desc: Deprecated install support.

property.name: PREFIX
property.desc: What comes before the library name.

property.name: PRE_INSTALL_SCRIPT
property.desc: Deprecated install support.

property.name: PRIVATE_HEADER
property.desc: Specify private header files in a FRAMEWORK shared library target.

property.name: PROJECT_LABEL
property.desc: Change the name of a target in an IDE.

property.name: PUBLIC_HEADER
property.desc: Specify public header files in a FRAMEWORK shared library target.

property.name: RELEASE_OUTPUT_NAME
property.desc: Sets the real name of a target when it is built.

property.name: RELEASE_POSTFIX
property.desc: Postfix to append to the target file name for configuration <CONFIG>.

property.name: RELWITHDEBINFO_OUTPUT_NAME
property.desc: Sets the real name of a target when it is built.

property.name: RELWITHDEBINFO_POSTFIX
property.desc: Postfix to append to the target file name for configuration <CONFIG>.

property.name: REPORT_UNDEFINED_PROPERTIES
property.desc: If set, report any undefined properties to this file.

property.name: RESOURCE
property.desc: Specify resource files in a FRAMEWORK shared library target.

property.name: RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
property.desc: Output directory in which to build RUNTIME target files.

property.name: SKIP_BUILD_RPATH
property.desc: Should rpaths be used for the build tree.

property.name: SOURCES
property.desc: Source names specified for a target.

property.name: SOVERSION
property.desc: What version number is this target.

property.name: STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS
property.desc: Extra flags to use when linking static libraries.

property.name: SUFFIX
property.desc: What comes after the library name.

property.name: SYMBOLIC
property.desc: Is this just a name for a rule.

property.name: TARGET_ARCHIVES_MAY_BE_SHARED_LIBS
property.desc: Set if shared libraries may be named like archives.

property.name: TARGET_SUPPORTS_SHARED_LIBS
property.desc: Does the target platform support shared libraries.

property.name: TEST_INCLUDE_FILE
property.desc: A cmake file that will be included when ctest is run.

property.name: TIMEOUT
property.desc: How many seconds to allow for this test.

property.name: TYPE
property.desc: The type of the target.

property.name: VARIABLES
property.desc: List of variables defined in the current directory.

property.name: VERSION
property.desc: What version number is this target.

property.name: VS_KEYWORD
property.desc: Visual Studio project keyword.

property.name: VS_SCC_LOCALPATH
property.desc: Visual Studio Source Code Control Provider.

property.name: VS_SCC_PROJECTNAME
property.desc: Visual Studio Source Code Control Project.

property.name: VS_SCC_PROVIDER
property.desc: Visual Studio Source Code Control Provider.

property.name: WILL_FAIL
property.desc: If set to true, this will invert the pass/fail flag of the test.

property.name: WIN32_EXECUTABLE
property.desc: Build an executable with a WinMain entry point on windows.

property.name: WRAP_EXCLUDE
property.desc: Exclude this source file from any code wrapping techniques.

property.name: XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute>
property.desc: Set Xcode target attributes directly.

property.name: __CMAKE_DELETE_CACHE_CHANGE_VARS_
property.desc: Internal property

command.name: add_custom_command
command.desc: Add a custom build rule to the generated build system.

usage.value: (OUTPUT output1 [output2 ...] COMMAND command1 [ARGS] [args1...] [COMMAND command2 [ARGS] [args2...] ...] [MAIN_DEPENDENCY depend] [DEPENDS [depends...]] [IMPLICIT_DEPENDS lang1 depend1 ...] [WORKING_DIRECTORY dir] [COMMENT comment] [VERBATIM] [APPEND])
(TARGET target PRE_BUILD | PRE_LINK | POST_BUILD COMMAND command1 [ARGS] [args1...] [COMMAND command2 [ARGS] [args2...] ...] [WORKING_DIRECTORY dir] [COMMENT comment] [VERBATIM])

command.name: add_custom_target
command.desc: Add a target with no output so it will always be built.

usage.value: (Name [ALL] [command1 [args1...]] [COMMAND command2 [args2...] ...] [DEPENDS depend depend depend ... ] [WORKING_DIRECTORY dir] [COMMENT comment] [VERBATIM] [SOURCES src1 [src2...]])

command.name: add_definitions
command.desc: Adds -D define flags to the compilation of source files.

command.name: add_dependencies
command.desc: Add a dependency between top-level targets.

command.name: add_executable
command.desc: Add an executable to the project using the specified source files.

command.name: add_library
command.desc: Add a library to the project using the specified source files.

command.name: add_subdirectory
command.desc: Add a subdirectory to the build.

command.name: add_test
command.desc: Add a test to the project with the specified arguments.

command.name: aux_source_directory
command.desc: Find all source files in a directory.

command.name: break
command.desc: Break from an enclosing foreach or while loop.

command.name: build_command
command.desc: Get the command line that will build this project.

command.name: build_name
command.desc: Deprecated. Use ${CMAKE_SYSTEM} and ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER} instead.

command.name: cmake_minimum_required
command.desc: Set the minimum required version of cmake for a project.

command.name: cmake_policy
command.desc: Manage CMake Policy settings.

command.name: configure_file
command.desc: Copy a file to another location and modify its contents.

command.name: create_test_sourcelist
command.desc: Create a test driver and source list for building test programs.

usage.value: (sourceListName driverName test1 test2 test3 EXTRA_INCLUDE include.h FUNCTION function)

command.name: define_property
command.desc: Define and document custom properties.

usage.value: (GLOBAL | DIRECTORY | TARGET | SOURCE | TEST | VARIABLE | CACHED_VARIABLE PROPERTY name [INHERITED] BRIEF_DOCS brief-doc FULL_DOCS full-doc)

command.name: else
command.desc: Starts the else portion of an if block.

command.name: elseif
command.desc: Starts the elseif portion of an if block.

command.name: enable_language
command.desc: Enable a language (CXX/C/Fortran/etc)

command.name: enable_testing
command.desc: Enable testing for current directory and below.

command.name: endforeach
command.desc: Ends a list of commands in a FOREACH block.

command.name: endfunction
command.desc: Ends a list of commands in a function block.

command.name: endif
command.desc: Ends a list of commands in an if block.

command.name: endmacro
command.desc: Ends a list of commands in a macro block.

command.name: endwhile
command.desc: Ends a list of commands in a while block.

command.name: exec_program
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the execute_process() command instead.

usage.value: (Executable [directory in which to run] [ARGS arguments to executable] [OUTPUT_VARIABLE var] [RETURN_VALUE var])

command.name: execute_process
command.desc: Execute one or more child processes.

usage.value: (COMMAND cmd1 [args1...]] [COMMAND cmd2 [args2...] [...]] [WORKING_DIRECTORY directory] [TIMEOUT seconds] [RESULT_VARIABLE variable] [OUTPUT_VARIABLE variable] [ERROR_VARIABLE variable] [INPUT_FILE file] [OUTPUT_FILE file] [ERROR_FILE file] [OUTPUT_QUIET] [ERROR_QUIET] [OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE] [ERROR_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE])

command.name: export
command.desc: Export targets from the build tree for use by outside projects.

command.name: export_library_dependencies
command.desc: Deprecated. Use INSTALL(EXPORT) or EXPORT command.

command.name: file
command.desc: File manipulation command.

usage.value: (STRINGS name variable [LIMIT_COUNT num] [LIMIT_INPUT numBytes] [LIMIT_OUTPUT numBytes] [LENGTH_MINIMUM numBytes] [LENGTH_MAXIMUM numBytes] [NEWLINE_CONSUME] [REGEX regex] [NO_HEX_CONVERSION])

command.name: find_file
command.desc: Find the full path to a file.

command.name: find_library
command.desc: Find a library.

usage.value: ( VAR name | NAMES name1 [name2 ...] [HINTS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATHS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATH_SUFFIXES suffix1 [suffix2 ...]] [DOC 'cache documentation string'] [NO_DEFAULT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_PATH] [NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PATH] [CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH | ONLY_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH | NO_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH] )

command.name: find_package
command.desc: Load settings for an external project.

usage.value: (package [version] [EXACT] [QUIET] [[REQUIRED|COMPONENTS] [components...]] [NO_MODULE] [NO_POLICY_SCOPE] [NAMES name1 [name2 ...]] [CONFIGS config1 [config2 ...]] [HINTS path1 [path2 ... ]] [PATHS path1 [path2 ... ]] [PATH_SUFFIXES suffix1 [suffix2 ...]] [NO_DEFAULT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_PATH] [NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_BUILDS_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PATH] [CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH | ONLY_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH | NO_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH])

command.name: find_path
command.desc: Find the directory containing a file.

usage.value: ( VAR name | NAMES name1 [name2 ...] [HINTS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATHS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATH_SUFFIXES suffix1 [suffix2 ...]] [DOC 'cache documentation string'] [NO_DEFAULT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_PATH] [NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PATH] [CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH | ONLY_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH | NO_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH] )

command.name: find_program
command.desc: Find an executable program.

usage.value: ( VAR name | NAMES name1 [name2 ...] [HINTS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATHS path1 [path2 ... ENV var]] [PATH_SUFFIXES suffix1 [suffix2 ...]] [DOC 'cache documentation string'] [NO_DEFAULT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_PATH] [NO_SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PATH] [NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PATH] [CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH | ONLY_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH | NO_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH] )

command.name: fltk_wrap_ui
command.desc: Create FLTK user interfaces Wrappers.

command.name: foreach
command.desc: Evaluate a group of commands for each value in a list.

command.name: function
command.desc: Start recording a function for later invocation as a command.

command.name: get_cmake_property
command.desc: Get a property of the CMake instance.

command.name: get_directory_property
command.desc: Get a property of the directory.

command.name: get_filename_component
command.desc: Get a specific component of a full filename.

command.name: get_property
command.desc: Get a property.

usage.value: (variable GLOBAL | DIRECTORY [dir] | TARGET target | SOURCE source | TEST test | VARIABLE PROPERTY name [SET | DEFINED | BRIEF_DOCS | FULL_DOCS])

command.name: get_source_file_property
command.desc: Get a property for a source file.

command.name: get_target_property
command.desc: Get a property from a target.

command.name: get_test_property
command.desc: Get a property of the test.

command.name: if
command.desc: Conditionally execute a group of commands.

usage.value: (expression2) # else section. COMMAND1(ARGS ...) COMMAND2(ARGS ...) ... else(expression) # else section. COMMAND1(ARGS ...) COMMAND2(ARGS ...) ... end

command.name: include
command.desc: Read CMake listfile code from the given file.

command.name: include_directories
command.desc: Add include directories to the build.

command.name: include_external_msproject
command.desc: Include an external Microsoft project file in a workspace.

command.name: include_regular_expression
command.desc: Set the regular expression used for dependency checking.

command.name: install
command.desc: Specify rules to run at install time.

usage.value: (TARGETS targets... [EXPORT export-name] [[ARCHIVE|LIBRARY|RUNTIME|FRAMEWORK|BUNDLE| PRIVATE_HEADER|PUBLIC_HEADER|RESOURCE] [DESTINATION dir] [PERMISSIONS permissions...] [CONFIGURATIONS [Debug|Release|...]] [COMPONENT component] [OPTIONAL] [NAMELINK_ONLY|NAMELINK_SKIP] ] [...])
(TARGETS myExe mySharedLib myStaticLib RUNTIME DESTINATION bin LIBRARY DESTINATION lib ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib/static)
(FILES files... DESTINATION dir [PERMISSIONS permissions...] [CONFIGURATIONS [Debug|Release|...]] [COMPONENT component] [RENAME name] [OPTIONAL])
(PROGRAMS files... DESTINATION dir [PERMISSIONS permissions...] [CONFIGURATIONS [Debug|Release|...]] [COMPONENT component] [RENAME name] [OPTIONAL])

(DIRECTORY dirs... DESTINATION dir [FILE_PERMISSIONS permissions...] [DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS permissions...] [USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS] [CONFIGURATIONS [Debug|Release|...]] [COMPONENT component] [FILES_MATCHING] [[PATTERN pattern | REGEX regex] [EXCLUDE] [PERMISSIONS permissions...]] [...])
(DIRECTORY icons scripts/ DESTINATION share/myproj PATTERN 'CVS' EXCLUDE PATTERN 'scripts/*' PERMISSIONS OWNER_EXECUTE OWNER_WRITE OWNER_READ GROUP_EXECUTE GROUP_READ)
(EXPORT export-name DESTINATION dir [NAMESPACE namespace] [FILE name.cmake] [PERMISSIONS permissions...] [CONFIGURATIONS [Debug|Release|...]] [COMPONENT component])

command.name: install_files
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the install(FILES ) command instead.

command.name: install_programs
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the install(PROGRAMS ) command instead.

command.name: install_targets
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the install(TARGETS ) command instead.

command.name: link_directories
command.desc: Specify directories in which the linker will look for libraries.

command.name: link_libraries
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the target_link_libraries() command instead.

command.name: list
command.desc: List operations.

command.name: load_cache
command.desc: Load in the values from another project's CMake cache.

command.name: load_command
command.desc: Load a command into a running CMake.

command.name: macro
command.desc: Start recording a macro for later invocation as a command.

command.name: make_directory
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ) command instead.

command.name: mark_as_advanced
command.desc: Mark cmake cached variables as advanced.

command.name: math
command.desc: Mathematical expressions.

command.name: message
command.desc: Display a message to the user.

command.name: option
command.desc: Provides an option that the user can optionally select.

command.name: output_required_files
command.desc: Output a list of required source files for a specified source file.

command.name: project
command.desc: Set a name for the entire project.

command.name: qt_wrap_cpp
command.desc: Create Qt Wrappers.

command.name: qt_wrap_ui
command.desc: Create Qt user interfaces Wrappers.

command.name: remove
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the list(REMOVE_ITEM ) command instead.

command.name: remove_definitions
command.desc: Removes -D define flags added by add_definitions.

command.name: return
command.desc: Return from a file, directory or function.

command.name: separate_arguments
command.desc: Split space separated arguments into a semi-colon separated list.

command.name: set
command.desc: Set a CMAKE variable to a given value.

command.name: set_directory_properties
command.desc: Set a property of the directory.

command.name: set_property
command.desc: Set a named property in a given scope.

usage.value: (GLOBAL | DIRECTORY [dir] | TARGET [target1 [target2 ...]] | SOURCE [src1 [src2 ...]] | TEST [test1 [test2 ...]] [APPEND] PROPERTY name [value1 [value2 ...]])

command.name: set_source_files_properties
command.desc: Source files can have properties that affect how they are built.

usage.value: (file1 file2 ... PROPERTIES prop1 value1 prop2 value2 ...)

command.name: set_target_properties
command.desc: Targets can have properties that affect how they are built.

usage.value: (target1 target2 ... PROPERTIES prop1 value1 prop2 value2 ...)

command.name: set_tests_properties
command.desc: Set a property of the tests.

command.name: site_name
command.desc: Set the given variable to the name of the computer.

command.name: source_group
command.desc: Define a grouping for sources in the makefile.

command.name: string
command.desc: String operations.

usage.value: (REGEX REPLACE regular_expression replace_expression output variable input [input...])

command.name: subdir_depends
command.desc: Deprecated. Does nothing.

command.name: subdirs
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the add_subdirectory() command instead.

command.name: target_link_libraries
command.desc: Link a target to given libraries.

command.name: try_compile
command.desc: Try compiling some code.

usage.value: (RESULT_VAR bindir srcdir projectName targetname [CMAKE_FLAGS Flags] [OUTPUT_VARIABLE var])
(RESULT_VAR bindir srcfile [CMAKE_FLAGS Flags] [COMPILE_DEFINITIONS flags ...] [OUTPUT_VARIABLE var] [COPY_FILE filename )

command.name: try_run
command.desc: Try compiling and then running some code.

usage.value: (RUN_RESULT_VAR COMPILE_RESULT_VAR bindir srcfile [CMAKE_FLAGS Flags] [COMPILE_DEFINITIONS flags] [COMPILE_OUTPUT_VARIABLE comp] [RUN_OUTPUT_VARIABLE run] [OUTPUT_VARIABLE var] [ARGS arg1 arg2...])

command.name: unset
command.desc: Unset a variable, cache variable, or environment variable.

command.name: use_mangled_mesa
command.desc: Copy mesa headers for use in combination with system GL.

command.name: utility_source
command.desc: Specify the source tree of a third-party utility.

command.name: variable_requires
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the if() command instead.

command.name: variable_watch
command.desc: Watch the CMake variable for change.

command.name: while
command.desc: Evaluate a group of commands while a condition is true

command.name: write_file
command.desc: Deprecated. Use the file(WRITE ) command instead.
